title: Bloomberg Markets: Mount Sinai CEO Reacts to Health Care Vote
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Mount Sinai CEO Reacts to Health Care Vote
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Kenneth Davis President/CEO Mount Sinai Health System Discussing the House passing Obamacare repeal and how health care reform could impact the hospital industry. He says that fee for service medicine is inefficient.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
